definitions.definition: That or those belonging to you ; the possessive second-person singular pronoun used without a following noun .
examples: If this edit is mine, the other must be yours .
Their encyclopedia is good, but yours is even better.
The socks of yours are a bit niffy.

definitions.definition: Written at the end of a letter, before the signature.
examples: Yours sincerely , Yours faithfully , Yours , Sincerely yours ,

main_definition: That or those belonging to you ; the possessive second-person singular pronoun used without a following noun .
secondary_definitions: Written at the end of a letter, before the signature.
